channel.title: Every Headline on the Internet on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Every Headline on the Internet on My New Hugo Site

item.title: On Memedom
item.description: [big]On Monday, something happened which I feel the need to address. I found a picture of a particularly depressing piece of pizza on Twitter. I saw a couple other folks making jokes about this pizza. And I decided to make a joke about something Iâ€™m very familiar with: Journalism.[/big] Little did I know that I would be responsible for creating a tweet so viral that it had the potential to crash my phone.
